item.description:
My time of doom is approaching: My first "official" 5k run. 

Would anyone like to join me for the Colt State 5k?  Described as "the jewel of the RI park system", the 5k will be a great start to the summer running season.  It's being held after work, and really... what else are you going to be doing on a Wednesday night anyhow?

I'm not a great runner - I've run twice between July 1st, 2010 and May 24, 2011, so don't worry if you're not fast.

IMPORTANT #1: Please make sure to sign up with the 5K organizers ( http://www.3craceproductions.com/RacePages/ColtStatePark5K.htm ).  There's an entrance fee that will grant you entrance and a free T-Shirt.  Neither I, this group nor Meetup get any of this fee.

 

IMPORTANT #2: The directions for the 5K say that we're meeting "at the barn".  Don't trust the address used by meetup!!  I'll update the address next time I get a chance to look around Colt State.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy with really short hair, or try my cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: Colt State Park 5K
